moves.1. e4: This is one of my most beautiful games i ever won.
moves.2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Nc3 Nf6 4. Bb5 g6 5. O-O B: I played this move to make his knight on the rim.
moves.6... O-O 7. e5: Here it goes. The only problem is that the pawn is now weak.
moves.7... Nh5 8. Bxc6: The pawn is now attacked. Not the best idea. Better was Re1.
moves.8... dxc6: This was a mistake because in the Sicilian it's better to take control of the center.
moves.9. d3: Ready to win the knight with g4.
moves.9... Bh8: Leaving an open space for the knight.
moves.13... Bb7 14. Ng5 Nf4 15. Qf3 e6: Blunder by black, not seeing my queen attacking the knight.
moves.18. Nf6+: The winning move. Black can't take the knight because of the queen hanging.
moves.19. Qxe5 Qxe5: Blunder that let me win the game.
